name: py-pyrosar

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A framework for large-scale SAR satellite data processing

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-progressbar2
dependencies.description: A progress bar for Python 2 and Python 3

dependencies.name: py-pathos
dependencies.description: Parallel graph management and execution in heterogeneous computing

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-scoop
dependencies.description:
SCOOP (Scalable COncurrent Operations in Python) is a distributed task
module allowing concurrent parallel programming on various environments,
from heterogeneous grids to supercomputers.

dependencies.name: py-spatialist
dependencies.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: gdal
dependencies.description:
GDAL: Geospatial Data Abstraction Library. GDAL is a translator library
for raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
MIT style Open Source License by the Open Source Geospatial Foundation.
As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data model and single
vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported
formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line utilities
for data translation and processing.
